Name: Ghost Opera House 剧院魅影
About the game: This is a first-person perspective VR horror decryption game. The player plays the role of a detective to investigate the supernatural events that took place in the theater, gradually completing the plot by talking to NPCs and collecting props, and in the step-by-step investigation of the truth, it was discovered that the terrible thing was not the resentful spirit, but something else...
